full_summary:
===============

**Government Tender Announcement**

### Title

* English: CSU-13B/P G-suits for the Harvard
* French: Combinaisons G CSU-13B/P pour le Harvard

### Reference Number

* English: W8485-237613/B
* French: W8485-237613/B

### Publication Date

* 2023-08-04

### Tender Closing Date

* 2023-08-22T14:00:00

### Contractor

* English: National Defence
* French: Défense Nationale
* Address: 101 Colonel By Drive, Ottawa, Ontario, K1A 0K2, Canada

### Tender Description

The Government of Canada seeks to acquire G-suits for the Harvard aircraft. The delivery of the items is expected to take place at Camp Follo Edmonton.

The following items are required:

* **Item 1**: Anti-G Garment, Cutaway, part number: MIL-DTL-83406D, quantity: 80 units
* **Item 2**: Anti-G Garment, Cutaway, part number: MIL-DTL-83406D, quantity: 60 units
* **Item 3**: Anti-G Garment, Cutaway, part number: MIL-DTL-83406D, quantity: 90 units
* **Item 4**: Anti-G Garment, Cutaway, part number: MIL-DTL-83406D, quantity: 60 units
* **Item 5**: Anti-G Garment, Cutaway, part number: MIL-DTL-83406D, quantity: 50 units
* **Item 6**: Anti-G Garment, Cutaway, part number: MIL-DTL-83406D, quantity: 40 units
* **Item 7**: Anti-G Garment, Cutaway, part number: MIL-DTL-83406D, quantity: 90 units

Bidders are required to submit their proposals electronically using the epost Connect service. The crown retains the right to negotiate with suppliers on any procurement. Documents may be submitted in either English or French.

### Important Dates

* Expected contract start date: 2023-11-08
* Expected contract end date: 2024-03-31

### Selection Criteria

* Lowest Price

### Trade Agreements

* World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)
* Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
*
